pages.text: All shell armors provide resistance when sneaking. All three sets can be crafted following the recipies in this book, but they can also be upgraded on the smithing table. See the upgrade section for those recipes.
The next tier shells can be crafted with is nautilus shells. This material can be obtained by fishing.
The final tier of the shell armors is the Turtle shell armor. A hard material that can be farmed off of raising turtles. This armor is better than iron in terms of defense.
